description: Travel down the sloping street towards the intersection with the main avenue, facing the red Ambacar building. At the junction marked by a 'PARE' sign and road arrows, turn right onto the main road. Continue straight ahead, passing a bus stop on the right, while keeping the large GWM dealership on your left.

ground_truth.target_name: Eloy Alfaro Y Camilo Gallegos Dominguez

agent_refined_route: Head Straight [45m] -> Turn Right -> Head Straight [30m]
